title: Mandate of the open-ended intergovernmental working group to elaborate the content of an international regulatory framework on the regulation, monitoring and oversight of the activities of private military and security companies
agenda_item_name: Promotion and protection of all human rights, civil, political, economic, social and cultural rights, including the right to development
subjects: UN. Human Rights Council. Intergovernmental Working Group to Elaborate the Content of An International Regulatory Framework on the Regulation, Monitoring and Oversight of the Activities of Private Military and Security Companies
